member.name: IMFPMPHost.CreateObjectByCLSID
member.summary: Creates an object in the protect media path (PMP) process, from a CLSID.
member.param: The CLSID of the object to create.

A pointer to the IStream interface. This parameter can be NULL. If this parameter is not NULL, the PMP host queries the created object for the interface and calls IPersistStream.Load, passing in the pStream pointer.
The interface identifier (IID) of the interface to retrieve.
Receives a pointer to the requested interface. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFPMPHost.LockProcess
member.summary: Blocks the protected media path (PMP) process from ending.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFPMPHost.UnlockProcess
member.summary: Decrements the lock count on the protected media path (PMP) process. Call this method once for each call to .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFPMPHost
member.summary: Enables a media source in the application process to create objects in the protected media path (PMP) process.
